an8.80:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna kammam kattabbam hoti.
an8.80:1.5: ‘kammam kho me kattabbam bhavissati. Kammam kho pana me karontassa kayo kilamissati. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:1.6: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an8.80:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna kammam katam hoti.
an8.80:2.3: ‘aham kho kammam akasim. Kammam kho pana me karontassa kayo kilanto. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:2.4: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an8.80:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna maggo gantabbo hoti.
an8.80:3.3: ‘maggo me gantabbo bhavissati. Maggam kho pana me gacchantassa kayo kilamissati. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:3.4: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an8.80:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna maggo gato hoti.
an8.80:4.3: ‘aham kho maggam agamasim. Maggam kho pana me gacchantassa kayo kilanto. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:4.4: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an8.80:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto na labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
an8.80:5.3: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto nalattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim. Tassa me kayo kilanto akammanno. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
an8.80:6.3: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto alattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim. Tassa me kayo garuko akammanno masacitam manne. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako abadho.
an8.80:7.3: ‘uppanno kho me ayam appamattako abadho atthi kappo nipajjitum. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilana vutthito hoti aciravutthito gelanna.
an8.80:8.3: ‘aham kho gilana vutthito aciravutthito gelanna. Tassa me kayo dubbalo akammanno. Handaham nipajjami’ti.
an8.80:8.4: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an8.80:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna kammam kattabbam hoti.
an8.80:9.5: ‘kammam kho me kattabbam bhavissati. Kammam kho maya karontena na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum. Handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
an8.80:9.6: So viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
